name: 楊元森
objective: 本課程將做為大一學生入學後第一門程式語言奠基課程，作為程式設計的基礎。教授內容包括電腦運作概念、程式設計原則、分支敘述、迴圈敘述、輸出、輸入敘述、陣列處理、字元處理、及子程式等課題。本課程並介紹 AI 基本原理與程式應用。
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction to Computers and Programming. Assignment: 
Week 2: Typing / Spreadsheet  formula, matrix multiplication and inversion 
Week 3: Spreadsheet formula: min, round, sqrt, if, countif, match, index and VBA basics
Week 4: Variables and mathematical formula
Week 5: Branching Statements 
Week 6: Loop 
Week 7: Array / Vector / Matrix
Week 8: Review and activities
Week 9: Midterm
Week 10: Programming on mathematical formula (I)
Week 11: Programming on mathematical formula (II)
Week 12: Programming on Branching and Loop (I)
Week 13: Programming on Branching and Loop (II)
Week 14: Programming on Branching and Loop (III)
Week 15: Programming on Functions and Subroutines (I)
Week 16: Programming on Functions and Subroutines (II)
Week 17: Review and activities
Week 18: Final exam.
scorePolicy:
Assignments and Activities: 25% +/- 5%
Midterm: 25% +/- 5%
Final exam: 50% +/- 10%
materials: Will be announced in the first-week lecture.
consultation: Will be announced in the first-week lecture.
課程是否導入AI: AI1：使用生成式 AI 作為教學過程的輔助工具（Use generative AI tools as an aid to the teaching process）AI2：鼓勵學生使用生成式 AI 工具（Encourage students to use generative AI tools）AI3：使用生成式 AI 進行課堂即時互動（Use generative AI for real-time classroom interaction）AI4：簡單介紹 AI 的基本概念（Briefly introduce the basic concept of AI）
